metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3061 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Found Linux Kernel flaw in the i740 driver. The Userspace program couldpass any values to the driver through ioctl() interface. The driver doesn'tcheck the value of 'pixclock', so it may cause a divide by zero error.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
